name.type.description: The content type of the QR code to be generated, such as 'link', 'text', etc.

name.failure.description: The failure status of the task

name.failureReason.description: The reason for the task failure

name.traceId.description: The trace ID of the task

name.size.description: The size of the QR code to be generated

name.createdAt.description: The date and time when the QR code was generated

name.pixelStyle.description: The pixel style of the QR code to be generated

name.startImageUrl.description: The seed for the QR code to be generated

name.endImageUrl.description: The seed for the QR code to be generated

name.paddingLevel.description: The padding level of the QR code to be generated

name.paddingNoise.description: The padding noise of the QR code to be generated

name.content.description: The content of the QR code to be generated

name.ecl.description: The error correction level of the QR code to be generated

name.position.description: The position of the QR code to be generated

name.rotate.description: The rotation for the QR code to be generated

name.enhancement.description: Advanced settings for the QR code to be generated

name.loop.description: Advanced settings for the QR code to be generated

name.aspectRatio.description: The aspect ratio of the QR code to be generated

name.markerShape.description: The marker shape of the QR code to be generated

name.subMarker.description: The sub marker of the QR code to be generated

name.qrw.description: The name of the QR code generator

name.steps.description: The number of steps to generate the QR code

name.preset.description: The preset for the QR code to be generated

name.lumaBot.description: The name of the Luma video generator

name.contentImageUrl.description: The content image URL for the QR code to be generated

description.loop.message: Enable looping for the generated video.

description.enhancement.message: If you're unsure how to write prompt text, enable enhancement for input prompt text.

description.startImageUrl.message: The URL of the start image, which will be the first frame of the generated video.

description.endImageUrl.message: The URL of the end image, which will be the last frame of the generated video.

description.prompt.message: Prompt words for generating Luma video

status.pending.description: The waiting status of the task

placeholder.prompt.message: Enter the prompt words for the style of the video to be generated, e.g.,: Astronauts shuttle from space to volcano
placeholder.prompt.description: Placeholder text in the prompt field

placeholder.content.message: Enter the content for the QR code to be generated, e.g.,: https://www.google.com
placeholder.content.description: Placeholder text in the content field

button.generate.description: Button text for generating Luma video

button.extend.description: Button text for continuing the generation

button.uploadQr.description: Button text for uploading a QR code

message.uploadQr.message: Upload a QR code image to generate an artistic QR code that matches the content of the QR code
message.uploadQr.description: Instruction for uploading a QR code

message.promptPlaceholder.message: Please enter a sentence describing the image to generate, for example: a cute cat. Additional parameters will override the default preset parameters.
message.promptPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text in the prompt field

message.uploadReferencesExceed.message: You can upload up to 5 images
message.uploadReferencesExceed.description: Error message when the number of uploaded images exceeds the limit

message.uploadReferencesSuccess.description: Success message when the image is uploaded successfully

message.uploadReferencesError.message: Image upload failed, please try again later
message.uploadReferencesError.description: Error message when image upload fails

message.startingTask.description: Message when the drawing task starts

message.startTaskSuccess.description: Success message when the task is successfully initiated

message.startTaskFailed.message: Failed to initiate the task, please contact the administrator
message.startTaskFailed.description: Error message when starting the drawing task fails

message.usedUp.message: Your credits are used up, please purchase more credits to continue using

message.generating.description: Message when the image is being generated

message.noOperations.description: Message when there are no available operations

message.noTasks.message: No history tasks, please click 'Generate Video' on the left
message.noTasks.description: Message when there are no tasks
